query:
WITH grouped AS (
                    SELECT signer_address, allocation_id
                    FROM tap_horizon_receipts
                    GROUP BY signer_address, allocation_id
                )
                SELECT DISTINCT
                    signer_address,
                    (
                        SELECT ARRAY
                        (
                            SELECT DISTINCT allocation_id
                            FROM grouped
                            WHERE signer_address = top.signer_address
                        )
                    ) AS allocation_ids
                FROM grouped AS top
